text:
A 75-year-old onion merchant Baskaran of Soorapallam near Vellichandai was knocked down by a lorry near Thingal Nagar market on Wednesday.

Grievously injured Baskaran succumbed to his injuries at KGMCH. The lorry knocked him down when he was walking on the roadside near Thingal Nagar market early in the morning. Eraniel police have arrested the lorry driver, Anish, and further investigations are on.
title: Septuagenarian knocked down
